import React from "react"; import blogImg1 from '../assets/images/blog_img1.png'; import blogImg2 from '../assets/images/blog_img2.png'; import blogImg3 from '../assets/images/blog_img3.png'; const BlogListmain = [ {id:1, blogImg:blogImg1,blogdate:new Date().toLocaleDateString(),title: "Heading" } ]; const Blog = () => { return (

Explore Our Blogs

{BlogListmain.map((BlogBox) => (
{BlogBox.blogdate}

{BlogBox.title}

{BlogBox.describtion}

Read More
))}
) } export default Blog;
